                     int numberOfTimes,

                              InterruptedException
        Gets the content of the url given.
        Parameters:
        url - the URL the GET request is sent
        numberOfTimes - the number of GET requests
        cookies - the cookies to set on the request, optional - null is a valid value
        Returns:
        the a list of HTTP Responses

                      int numberOfTimes,

        Posts data to the url given.
        Parameters:
        url - the URL the POST request is sent
        postData - list of input data for the POST requests
        numberOfTimes - the number of POST requests
        cookies - the cookies to set on the request, optional - null is a valid value

      • setCookies

        protected void setCookies(org.eclipse.jetty.client.ContentExchange exchange,
              List<HttpCookie> cookies)
        sets the cookies on the exchange if present
        Parameters:
        exchange - the exchange to work with
        cookies - the cookie list; if null nothing happens
